name: Assassin's Promise
description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) You gain 5...17...20 Energy and all your skills recharge if target foe dies.

name: Assassin's Remedy
description: Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your next 1...8...10 attack skills each remove one condition.

name: Assault Enchantments
description: Elite Skill. Removes all enchantments. Must follow a dual attack.

name: Augury of Death
description: Half Range Hex Spell. (5...29...35 seconds.) Inflict Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) and Shadow Step to target foe the next time damage would drop this foe's Health below 50%.

name: Aura of Displacement
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location.

name: Beguiling Haze
description: Elite Spell. You Shadow Step to this foe. Inflicts Dazed condition (3...8...9 seconds).

name: Black Lotus Strike
description: Lead Attack. Deals +10...27...31 damage. You gain 5...11...13 Energy if target foe is hexed.

name: Black Mantis Thrust
description: Lead Attack. Deals +8...18...20 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...13...15 seconds) if target foe is hexed.

name: Black Spider Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds). Must strike a hexed foe.

name: Blades of Steel
description: Dual Attack. Deals +5...14...16 damage (maximum 60) for each recharging dagger attack. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Blinding Powder
description: Spell. Inflicts Blindness condition (3...13...15 seconds) on target and adjacent foes. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Caltrops
description: Half Range Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...13...15 seconds) on target and adjacent foes.

name: Crippling Dagger
description: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals 15...51...60 earth damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...13...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

name: Critical Agility
description: Enchantment Spell. (4 seconds plus 1 second for each rank of Critical Strikes.) You attack 33% faster and gain +15...25 armor. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

name: Critical Defenses
description: Enchantment Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) You have a 75% chance to block. Renewal: every time you land a critical hit.

name: Critical Eye
description: Skill. (10...30...35 seconds.) You have +3...13...15% chance to land a critical hit. You gain 1 Energy whenever you land a critical hit.

name: Critical Strike
description: Dual Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage. Automatic critical hit. You gain 1...3...3 Energy. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Dancing Daggers
description: Half Range Spell. Three projectiles: each deals 5...29...35 earth damage. Counts as a lead attack.

name: Dark Apostasy
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (3...14...17 seconds.) Your critical hits remove an enchantment. Removal cost: lose 10...5...4 Energy or Dark Apostasy ends.

name: Dark Escape
description: Stance. (5...13...15 seconds.) You move 25% faster and take half damage. Ends if you hit with an attack.

name: Dark Prison
description: Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. This foe moves 33% slower (1...5...6 seconds).

name: Dash
description: Stance. (3 seconds.) You move 50% faster.

name: Deadly Haste
description: Enchantment Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) Your half-ranged spells cast 5...41...50% faster and recharge 5...41...50% faster.

name: Deadly Paradox
description: Stance. (5...13...15 seconds.) Your Assassin skills activate and recharge 33% faster. Disables your attack skills (10 seconds).

name: Death Blossom
description: Dual Attack. Deals +20...40...45 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Death's Charge
description: Spell. You Shadow Step to target foe. You are healed for 65...173...200 if this foe has more Health than you.

name: Death's Retreat
description: Spell. Gain 40...112...130 Health if you have less Health than target ally. Initial effect: Shadow Step to this ally. Cannot self-target.

name: Desperate Strike
description: Lead Attack. Deals +15...51...60 damage if you have less than 50...74...80% Health.

name: Disrupting Dagger
description: Half Range Spell. Projectile: deals 10...30...35 earth damage. Interrupts a skill.

name: Disrupting Stab
description: Lead Attack. Interrupts an action. If the interrupted action was a spell

name: Enduring Toxin
description: Hex Spell. (5 seconds.) Causes -1...4...5 Health degeneration. Renewal: if the target foe is moving when this hex ends.

name: Entangling Asp
description: Spell. Causes knock-down. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds). Must follow a lead attack.

name: Exhausting Assault
description: Dual Attack. Interrupts an action. Inflicts 10 Overcast if the interrupted action was a spell. Must follow a lead attack.

name: Expose Defenses
description: Hex Spell. (1...9...11 seconds.) Target foe cannot block your attacks.

name: Expunge Enchantments
description: Touch Skill. Removes one enchantment for each non-attack skill you have. All your non-attack skills are disabled (10...6...5 seconds).

name: Falling Lotus Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +15...31...35 damage; you gain 1...10...12 Energy. No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.

name: Falling Spider
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +15...31...35 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds). No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.

name: Feigned Neutrality
description: Enchantment Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) You have +7 Health regeneration and +80 armor. Ends if you hit with an attack or use a skill.

name: Flashing Blades
description: Elite Stance. (5...25...30 seconds.) You have 75% chance to block while attacking. Block effect: 5...17...20 damage to your attacker.

name: Fox Fangs
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...30...35 damage. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.

name: Fox's Promise
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Your dagger attacks are unblockable. Ends the next time you fail to hit.

name: Golden Fang Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds) if you are enchanted. Must follow a lead attack.

name: Golden Fox Strike
description: Lead Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage. Unblockable if you are Enchanted.

name: Golden Lotus Strike
description: Lead Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. You gain 5...7...8 Energy if you are enchanted.

name: Golden Phoenix Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage to target and deals 10...26...30 damage to adjacent foes. Fails if you are not enchanted.

name: Golden Skull Strike
description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Inflicts Dazed condition (1...4...5 seconds). No effect unless you are enchanted.

name: Heart of Shadow
description: Spell. You are healed for 30...126...150 and you Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

name: Hidden Caltrops
description: Elite Hex Spell. (1...8...10 seconds.) Causes 50% slower movement. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (1...12...15 seconds). Your non-Assassin skills are disabled (10 seconds.)

name: Horns of the Ox
description: Dual Attack. Deals +1...9...11 damage. Causes knock-down if the target foe is not adjacent to any of its allies. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Impale
description: Skill. Deals 25...85...100 earth damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds). Must follow a dual attack.

name: Iron Palm
description: Touch Skill. Deals 5...41...50 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is hexed or has a condition. Counts as a lead attack.

name: Jagged Strike
description: Lead Attack. Inflicts Bleeding condition (5...17...20 seconds).

name: Jungle Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage. Deals +1...25...31 damage to target and adjacent foes if target foe is Crippled. Must follow a lead attack.

name: Leaping Mantis Sting
description: Lead Attack. Deals +5...13...15 damage. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...13...15 seconds) if target foe is moving.

name: Lift Enchantment
description: Touch Skill. Removes one enchantment. No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.

name: Locust's Fury
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) You have +50% chance to double strike. No effect unless you are wielding daggers.

name: Lotus Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...22...25 damage; you gain 5...17...20 Energy. Must follow a lead attack.

name: Malicious Strike
description: Melee Attack. If target foe has a condition
column10: this attack deals +10...26...30 damage and is a critical hit.

name: Mantis Touch
description: Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (5...17...20 seconds). This skill counts as an off-hand attack. Must follow a lead attack.

name: Mark of Death
description: Hex Spell. (4...9...10 seconds.) Target foe receives 33% less from healing.

name: Mark of Insecurity
description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...21...25 seconds.) Causes 1...3...3 Health degeneration. Enchantments and stances expire 30...70...80% faster on target foe. Disables your non-Assassin skills (10 seconds).

name: Mark of Instability
description: Hex Spell. (20 seconds.) Causes knock-down the next time you hit target foe with a dual attack.

name: Mirrored Stance
description: Hex Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) You enter any stance used by target foe.

name: Moebius Strike
description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...30...35 damage. Recharges all your other attack skills if target foe's Health is below 50%. Must follow a dual attack.

name: Nine Tail Strike
description: Dual Attack. Deals +15...35...40 damage. Unblockable. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Palm Strike
description: Elite Touch Skill. Deals 10...54...65 damage and inflicts Crippled condition (1...4...5 seconds). This skill counts as an off-hand attack.

name: Recall
description: Enchantment Spell. End effect: Shadow Step to target ally. Cannot self-target and disables all of your skills for 10 seconds when it ends.

name: Repeating Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...26...30 damage. This skill has +15 second recharge time if it misses. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Return
description: Spell. Inflicts Crippled condition (3...7...8 seconds) on all foes adjacent to you. You Shadow Step to target ally's location. Cannot self-target.

name: Sadist's Signet
description: Signet. You gain 10...34...40 Health for each condition on target foe.

name: Scorpion Wire
description: Half Range Hex Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe and cause knock-down the next time this foe is more than 100' away from you.

name: Seeping Wound
description: Elite Half Range Hex Spell. (1...6...7 seconds.) Target foe moves 33% slower. This foe takes 5...21...25 damage each second while suffering from a condition.

name: Shadow Fang
description: Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. End effect after 10 seconds: inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...17...20 seconds); you return to your original location.

name: Shadow Form
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...18...21 seconds.) Enemy spells cannot target you. Gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than 5...21...25 damage with a single skill or attack.

name: Shadow Meld
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. Shadow Step to target ally. End effect: return to your original location. Cannot self-target.

name: Shadow Prison
description: Elite Hex Spell. Shadow Step to target foe. This foe moves 66% slower (1...6...7 seconds).

name: Shadow Refuge
description: Enchantment Spell. (6 seconds.) You have +5...9...10 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for 40...88...100 if you are attacking.

name: Shadow Sanctuary
description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You gain +7...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor. You are Blind (5 seconds).

name: Shadow Shroud
description: Elite Hex Spell. (3...8...9 seconds.) Target foe cannot be the target of enchantments.

name: Shadow Theft
description: Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...17...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...4...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...4...5. Counts as a Lead Attack. PvE Skill

name: Shadow Walk
description: Stance. (15 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location. Disables your attack skills for 1 second. Disables your stances and enchantments for 10 seconds.

name: Shadow of Haste
description: Stance. (10...34...40 seconds.) You move 15% faster. End effect: return to your original location.

name: Shadowy Burden
description: Hex Spell. (3...13...15 seconds.) Target foe moves 25% slower and has 20 less armor against your attacks. Armor reduction only affects this foe while it has no other hexes.

name: Shameful Fear
description: Hex Spell. (10 seconds.) Target foe takes 5...17...20 damage each second while moving

name: Sharpen Daggers
description: Enchantment Spell. (5...25...30 seconds.) Your dagger attacks inflict the Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds).

name: Shattering Assault
description: Elite Dual Attack. Deals 5...41...50 damage. Removes one enchantment. Unblockable. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Shroud of Distress
description: Enchantment Spell. (30...54...60 seconds.) You have 3...7...8 health regeneration and a 75% chance to block. No effect unless your Health is below 50%.

name: Shroud of Silence
description: Elite Touch Hex Spell. (1...3...3 seconds.) Target foe cannot cast spells. Your spells are disabled for 15 seconds.

name: Signet of Deadly Corruption
description: Signet. Deals 5...29...35 damage (maximum 130) for each condition on target foe.

name: Signet of Malice
description: Signet. You lose one condition for each condition on target foe.

name: Signet of Shadows
description: Signet. Deals 5...29...35 damage. Deals 15...51...60 more damage if target foe is Blinded.

name: Signet of Toxic Shock
description: Signet. Deals 10...82...100 damage. No effect unless target foe is Poisoned

name: Signet of Twilight
description: Signet. Removes one enchantment for each hex on target foe.

name: Siphon Speed
description: Half Range Hex Spell. (5...13...15 seconds.) Target foe moves 33% slower and you move 33% faster. Recharges 50% faster if cast on a moving foe.

name: Siphon Strength
description: Elite Hex Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Target foe deals -5...41...50 attack damage. You have +33% chance to land a critical hit on this foe.

name: Smoke Powder Defense
description: Stance. (8 seconds.) The next time you are struck
column10: you take half damage and inflict Blindness condition (2...5...6 seconds) on adjacent foes.

name: Spirit Walk
description: Spell. Shadow Step to target Spirit.

name: Swap
description: Spell. You and target summoned creature Shadow Step to each other's locations.

name: Temple Strike
description: Elite Off-Hand Attack. Interrupts a spell. Inflicts Dazed and Blindness conditions (1...8...10 seconds). Must follow a lead attack.

name: Trampling Ox
description: Dual Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage; causes knock-down if target foe is Crippled. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Twisting Fangs
description: Dual Attack. Deals +10...18...20 damage. Inflicts Bleeding and Deep Wound conditions (5...17...20 seconds). Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Unseen Fury
description: Stance. Inflicts Blindness condition on adjacent foes (3...9...10). You cannot be blocked by Blinded foes for 10...26...30 seconds.

name: Unsuspecting Strike
description: Lead Attack. Deals +19...29...31 damage. Deals 15...63...75 more damage if target foe's Health is above 90%.

name: Vampiric Assault
description: Dual Attack. Steals 10...34...40 Health if this attack hits. Must follow an off-hand attack.

name: Viper's Defense
description: Spell. Inflict Poisoned condition (5...17...20 seconds) on all adjacent foes and Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

name: Vicious Attack
description: Spear Attack. Deals +5...17...20 damage. Inflicts Deep Wound condition (5...13...15 seconds) with a critical hit.

name: Wastrel's Collapse
description: Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. Causes knock-down if target foe is not using a skill. Disables your non-dagger attack skills (10 seconds).

name: Way of Perfection
description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Your critical hits heal you for 10...34...40.

name: Way of the Assassin
description: Elite Stance. (20 seconds.) While wielding daggers
column10: you attack 5...17...20% faster and have +5...29...35% chance to land a critical hit.

name: Way of the Empty Palm
description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...17...20 seconds.) Your off-hand and dual attacks cost no Energy.

name: Way of the Fox
description: Enchantment Spell. (10...30...35 seconds.) Your attacks are unblockable. Ends after 1...5...6 attacks.

name: Way of the Lotus
description: Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) You gain 5...17...20 Energy the next time you hit with a dual attack.

name: Way of the Master
description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) While holding a non-dagger weapon
column10: you have +3...27...33% chance to land a critical hit.

name: Wild Strike
description: Off-Hand Attack. Deals +10...30...35 damage. Removes target foe's stance. Unblockable. Must follow a lead attack.
